articles.title: AWS outage: Are we relying too much on US big tech? - BBC
articles.description: Monday's enormous outage has sharpened the debate over whether the world is too reliant on a few US firms.
articles.content:
Liv McMahonTechnology reporter
The Amazon Web Services (AWS) outage on Monday made global headlines after knocking some of the world's largest sites offline for hours.
For users, the impacts ranged… [+6048 chars]
